[code=java]
import java.awt.event.;
import javax.swing.;

public class ReadFile extends JFrame{

private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
private JTextField addressbar;
private JEditorPane display;

public ReadFile(){
super(“RSPS Browser”);

addressbar=new JTextField("typeyourrspsurlhere");
addressbar.addActionListener(null);{
	}
}
	public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event){ 
		loadCrap(event.getActionCommand());
	}
	private void loadCrap(String actionCommand) {
		
		
	}
	
	void add(){
	display=new JEditorPane();
	display.setEditable(false);
	}

}[/code]

Loael

item.title: Learning about GUI? Look here
item.dc:creator: @Aetoc Aetoc
item.description:
@Aetoc wrote:

[quote=“dclawed, post:3, topic:456179”][quote author=Aetoc link=topic=559123.msg4087420#msg4087420 date=1346006293]
l2 pastebin & l2 use tags
[/quote]

Pastebin? What, I made this, I dont know how to add it so that its in a box.[/quote]

Well there is this drop-down when your making a post or editing one, It says ‘Insert Code’ click that and hit java and
put the code inside the brackets like this.



import java.awt.*;
import.awt.event.*;
import javax.swing.*;
import javax.swing.event.*;

public class ReadFile extends JFrame{
    
}

  private JTextField addressbar;
    private JEditorPane display;
    
    //constructor
    public ReadFile(){
        super("RSPS Browser");
        
        addressBar=new JTextField("typeyourrspsurlhere")
        addressBar .addActionListener(
                new ActionListener(){
                    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event){
                        loadCrap(event.getActionCommand());
                        
                        
                        
                    }
                }
    };
    add(addressBar, BorderLayout.NORTH);
     
    display=new JEditorPane();
     display.setEditable(false);
    
     }

@dclawed wrote:

Hello,

I am dclawed, I am currently learning about Java, I have created for you a GUI. Will be adding more later. You can change (false) to (true) if you are using notepad etc.

[center]import java.awt.;
import.awt.event.;
import javax.swing.;
import javax.swing.event.;

public class ReadFile extends JFrame{

}

/** private JTextField addressbar;
private JEditorPane display;

//constructor
public ReadFile(){
    super("RSPS Browser");
    
    addressBar=new JTextField("typeyourrspsurlhere")
    addressBar .addActionListener(
            new ActionListener(){
                public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event){
                    loadCrap(event.getActionCommand());
                    
                    
                    
                }
            }
};
add(addressBar, BorderLayout.NORTH);
* 
* display=new JEditorPane();
* display.setEditable(false);
* 
* }
